product_name: Mountain Hardwear Desna Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A technical hooded fleece with incredible stretch, the men's Mountain Hardwear Desna Fleece Jacket aces climbs and ascents with great freedom of movement. Polyester/spandex stretch fleece provides a lot of warmth for its light weight. Layers easily under a shell as a lightweight midlayer or works as a stand-alone jacket. Close-fitting hood is designed to fit under a helmet; elastic binding and high neck offer excellent protection from weather. Zippered hand pockets and single zippered chest pocket stow essentials. Thumb loops extend coverage over hands. Mountain Hardwear Desna Fleece Jacket for men features dual hem drawcords for quick adjustments. Closeout.
short_description: A technical hooded fleece with incredible stretch, the men's Mountain Hardwear Desna Fleece Jacket aces climbs and ascents with great freedom of movement.
